Layer.onMouseWheel

Function/Meaning
Mouse wheel rotated
Type
Event of the Layer class
Syntax
onMouseWheel(shift, delta, x, y)
Arguments
shift The state of the shift keys and mouse buttons pressed at the same time the mouse was moved. It is a combination of the following values by bitwise OR.
ssAlt : ALT key was pressed
ssShift : SHIFT key was pressed
ssCtrl : CTRL key was pressed
ssLeft : Left mouse button was pressed
ssMiddle : Middle mouse button was pressed
ssRight : Right mouse button was pressed
delta The rotation angle of the wheel. Positive if rotated upwards (away from the user), negative if rotated downwards (towards the user). Usually, the minimum increment is 120.
x The x-coordinate of the position where the wheel was rotated (in the layer's display coordinates).
y The y-coordinate of the position where the wheel was rotated (in the layer's display coordinates).
Description
Occurs when the mouse wheel is rotated.
Like keyboard events, this event only occurs for the layer that has focus.
